scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint John the Baptist, wearing a blue robe and a red halo, is seated and holding an open book. He is shown in profile, looking down at a kneeling figure dressed in white with a red halo, who appears to be receiving a blessing or instruction. The background is a richly patterned tapestry in shades of blue, red, and gold. The scene is set on a green ground.
